title: API Academy: Making Requests with Postman

validation_fields.name: answer1
validation_fields.label: Create a Postman account and login to Postman's web interface. Confirm you've successfully done so by typing `confirm`.

validation_fields.name: answer2
validation_fields.label: Use Postman to make a request to the Twilio Programmable SMS API that will send a message from your Twilio number to your personal phone number. The message should say `Postman rocks!` Find the message `sid` in the server's response and paste it here. Press HACK so the <hoppper mascot> will let you pass.
